title.narrative: EQUITABLE ACCESS TO EDUCATION

description.narrative: Equitable access to educational opportunities., which contributes to Education In Emergencies, Education â€“ General, Equitable Access To Quality Education, Equity â€“ Focus On Girls' And Inclusive Education, Learning And Child-Friendly Schools, Skills Development. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Ensure that the right to quality education for all children (girls and boys) is fulfilled in a protective learning environment.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Equitable access to educational opportunities.

description.narrative: Scaling up the Back-to-Learning campaign in the months prior to the start of the scholastic year greatly increased student enrolment. Awareness raising activities for parents and caregivers encouraged positive attitudes towards prioritising education services in the public sector. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:12/01/2017
